ubiquity uses ssh to transmit a gpg-encrypted set of files to a remote server, the only thing that you need to have on the remote and is a ssh-accessible account, if that's what you want to use
oh and yes, rsync is sweet (ubiquity uses the rsync protocol for the actual transfers btw)
